item.title: This Week’s Japanese Game Releases: Dynasty Warriors: Origins, Donkey Kong Country Returns HD, more
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/this-weeks-japanese-game-releases-dynasty-warriors-origins-donkey-kong-country-returns-hd-more

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Smartphone
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Tales of Graces f Remastered, SYNDUALITY: Echo of Ada Deluxe Edition, etc.

Dynasty Warriors: Origins for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC, and Donkey Kong Country Returns HD for Switch are the highlights of this week’s Japanese video game releases.

Also due out this week are Tales of Graces f Remastered for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC, and the Deluxe Edition of SYNDUALITY: Echo of Ada for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC. The standard edition will follow next week.

Get the full list of this week’s Japanese game releases below. It should be noted that Gematsu will receive a small percentage of money from purchases made through Play-Asia links. You can also save five percent with our multi-use “GEMATSU2025” coupon code.

Physical and Digital

  • Donkey Kong Country Returns HD (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (Switch)
    • European Version (Switch)
    • Asian Version (Switch)
  • Dynasty Warriors: Origins (PS5) – Launching worldwide.
    • Limited Edition (PS5)
    • North American Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
    • European Version (PS5, Xbox Series)
    • Asian Version (PS5)
      • Limited Edition (PS5)
  • Kenka Bancho Otome Double Pack (Switch)
  • SYNDUALITY: Echo of Ada Deluxe Edition (PS5) – Launching digitally worldwide.
    • Special Edition (PS5)
    • Super Special Edition (PS5)
  • Tales of Graces f Remastered (PS5, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
    • North American Version (PS5, Switch)
    • European Version (PS5, PS4, Xbox Series / Xbox One, Switch)
    • Asian Version (PS5, Switch)
  • YOBARAI Detective: Miasma Breaker (Switch) – Launching worldwide.

Digital-Only

  • Aloft Early Access (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Arken Age (PS VR2, SteamVR) – Launching worldwide.
  • Assetto Corsa EVO Early Acces (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Blade Chimera (Switch, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Bright Memory: Infinite (iOS, Android) – Launching worldwide.
  • Cavern Adventurers (Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • DreadOut Remastered Collection (PS5, PS4, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Dynasty Warriors: Origins (Xbox Series, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • FINAL KNIGHT (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Final Zone (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • Hyper Light Breaker Early Access (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Long Gone Days (PS5, Switch) – Already available worldwide.
  • RANDOMAX (PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Runny Bunny (PS5, Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, Switch) – Launching worldwide.
  • SYNDUALITY: Echo of Ada Deluxe Edition (Xbox Series, PC [Steam]) – Launching digitally worldwide.
  • Tales of Graces f Remastered (Xbox Series, PS4, Xbox One, PC [Steam]) – Launching worldwide.
  • Turnip Boy Robs a Bank (iOS, Android) – Launching worldwide.

The PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch titles listed above can be purchased through Japanese PlayStation Network and Nintendo accounts using prepaid cards:

  • PlayStation Store cards (yen): 1,100 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 10,000
  • Nintendo eShop cards (yen): 1,000 / 1,500 / 3,000 / 5,000 / 9,000

item.title: SYNDUALITY: Echo of Ada ‘Story’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/synduality-echo-of-ada-story-trailer

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out on January 23—or January 16 for the Deluxe Edition.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Game Studio have released the official story trailer for extraction shooter SYNDUALITY: Echo of Ada.

Here is an overview of the game, via Bandai Namco:

About

SYNDUALITY: Echo of Ada takes place in 2222, years after a mysterious poisonous rain called The Tears of the New Moon wiped out most of humanity and birthed deformed creatures that now hunt the population. Amidst the calamity, humans are forced to build an underground haven to survive.

Take on the role of a Drifter whose goal is to collect the rare resource known as AO Crystals. In your quest, you must collaborate with your artificial intelligence partner to face xenomorphic creatures known as Enders and survive the hazards on the surface.

Survive the Surface

Rise from the underground to a surface world infested with hostile Enders, toxic rains, and other enemies, as you fight to loot for resources. Ride your CRADLECOFFIN, cooperate with your Magus, and stay alert around other players. One false move is all it takes to lose both your mecha and precious supplies, left to be scavenged by the remaining survivors.

The Magus: Your Personal Partner to Keep

This humanoid AI supports in exploration, scavenging, and combat. Each model type has a different personality, and its appearance can be extensively customized. They operate by giving tailored feedback on the objective based on analysis of your previous performance in sorties so you don’t make the same mistakes twice. Keep them close, as Magus can also unleash unique abilities when you are in a tough spot!

The CRADLECOFFIN: Your Vehicle to Ride

The CRADLECOFFIN is an all-weather bipod developed for the harsh terrain of the surface. Each mecha has a different endurance level, load capacity, operation time, and can be further customized with many body parts and weapons to suit each sortie and try new playstyles. Craft new parts by collecting resources and upgrading the garage and discover how powerful a CRADLECOFFIN can become!

SYNDUALITY: Echo of Ada is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on January 23. Users who purchase the Deluxe Edition will be able to access the game seven days early starting January 16.

Watch the trailer below.

Story Trailer
